root.name: Puzzler World 2
root.description: OverviewSolve over 1200 puzzles in this second chapter of the Puzzler series.Play games like:WordsearchFitwordSudokuCrosswordHide and SeekLink-a-PixBackwordsSilhouettePiecewordAdditional bonus games to unlock :Picture QuizSplitwordsChain LettersColour-InSum-UpJigsawHangmanChain LettersPC System RequirementsOperating system:Windows® 2000 / XP / Vista™ / Windows® 7(admin rights required). NOTE: 95/98/ME/NT not supported.Processor: Min Pentium 4 2GHz or Athlon XP/64bit EquivalentMemory: 1GB System MemoryHard disk space: 3.5GBVideo:128MB Directx 9.0c Video CardSound:Sound card with DirectX 9.0c supportDirectX®:9.0c or higher
